name: bulk_price_check
description: Submit a background task to look up pricing for multiple products at once. Returns a task_id for status polling and result retrieval. Useful for comparing prices across product families or building multi-product quotations.

queries.description: List of pricing queries to execute

query.description: Product SKU, family, or free-text search term

filter_type.description: Type of lookup to perform. Default: 'search'

thickness_mm.description: Optional: filter by panel thickness in mm
